actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the design and development of a swimming beach area at the Federal water resources development project at Shenago River Lake, Ohio River Basin, Pennsylvania and Ohio.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to design and develop a swimming beach area at the Shenango River water resources development project in Pennsylvania, at a Federal expense not to exceed $1,000,000. Requires that non-Federal interests agree to assume all operation and minor maintenance costs over the life of the beach area development,

titles.title: A bill to authorize the design and development of a swimming beach area at the Federal water resources development project at Shenago River Lake, Ohio River Basin, Pennsylvania and Ohio.
